NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
VESSEL PRIVASEA 4, SIX PERSONS ON BOARD, TAKING
ON WATER IN 18-40.24N 044-08.53W. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
REPORTS TO RSC SAN JUAN,
PHONE: 787 289 2041,
E-MAIL: SSJCC@USCG.MIL OR RCC MIAMI,
E-MAIL: RCCMIAMI@USCG.MIL.
